mobile.name: red headed barkeeper seamus
mobile.long: Seamus, the red headed barkeeper stands behind the bar.
mobile.part: head arms legs heart brains guts hands feet fingers ear eye

mobile.name: squirrel
mobile.desc: The squirrel is small, but has a large, almost transparent tail. Its black eyes dart about in search for something edible.

object.name: arden village tree
object.desc: A massive tree with swirly green leaves is here.

object.name: arden village grass
object.desc: A small field of emerald green grass is here.
object.short: a field of emerald green grass

object.name: small bed
object.desc: A small bed with white cotton sheets is here.

object.name: small key
object.desc: A small iron key is here.

room.name: Arden Village - Centre Town Square
room.desc: Before you is the sacred tree of the town, amid a field of emerald grass. The tree is clearly old and knotted, at least as thick as a tall human. The sienna trunk extends upwards, rising above the rooftops of the shops. The round leaves of the tree seem almost painted: a swirl of dark and light greens, mingling with a silvery overtone. The rich green grass is soft and tall, swaying quietly with even the slightest of breezes.

room.name: Arden Village - North Town Square
room.desc: The town square is an energetic place. The sounds of the small community's gossip, news and debates ring clearly through the aire. The ground is packed dirt, carefully packed as densely as it could possibly be in an attempt to prevent dust from stirring up. To the south, you can see a small field of grass and a giant tree. To the northwest, there is a small tavern. A wooden sign stands above it declaring it 'The Green Dragon. ' To the northeast, there is a shop with a 'FOR SALE' sign in its window.

room.name: Arden Village - Northeast Town Square
room.desc: The town square is an energetic place. The sounds of the small community's gossip, news and debates ring clearly through the aire. The ground is packed dirt, carefully packed as densely as it could possibly be in an attempt to prevent dust from stirring up. To the southwest, you can see a small field of grass and a giant tree. A sign saying 'Cedar Road' points to the northeast.

room.name: Arden Village - East Town Square
room.desc: The town square is an energetic place. The sounds of the small community's gossip, news and debates ring clearly through the aire. The ground is packed dirt, carefully packed as densely as it could possibly be in an attempt to prevent dust from stirring up. To the west, you can see a small field of grass and a giant tree. To the northeast and southeast, you can see two shops with 'FOR SALE' signs in their windows.

room.name: Arden Village - Southeast Town Square
room.desc: The town square is an energetic place. The sounds of the small community's gossip, news and debates ring clearly through the aire. The ground is packed dirt, carefully packed as densely as it could possibly be in an attempt to prevent dust from stirring up. To the northwest, you can see a small field of grass and a giant tree. A sign saying 'Pine Road' points to the southeast.

room.desc: The town square is an energetic place. The sounds of the small community's gossip, news and debates ring clearly through the aire. The ground is packed dirt, carefully packed as densely as it could possibly be in an attempt to prevent dust from stirring up. To the northeast, you can see a small field of grass and a giant tree. A sign saying 'Maple Road' points to the southwest.

room.name: Arden Village - South Town Square
room.desc: The town square is an energetic place. The sounds of the small community's gossip, news and debates ring clearly through the aire. The ground is packed dirt, carefully packed as densely as it could possibly be in an attempt to prevent dust from stirring up. To the north, you can see a small field of grass and a giant tree. To the southeast and southwest, you can see two shops with 'FOR SALE' signs in their windows.

room.desc: The town square is an energetic place. The sounds of the small community's gossip, news and debates ring clearly through the aire. The ground is packed dirt, carefully packed as densely as it could possibly be in an attempt to prevent dust from stirring up. To the east, you can see a small field of grass and a giant tree. To the northwest and southwest, you can see two shops with 'FOR SALE' signs in their windows.

room.name: Arden Village - Northwest Town Square
room.desc: The town square is an energetic place. The sounds of the small community's gossip, news and debates ring clearly through the aire. The ground is packed dirt, carefully packed as densely as it could possibly be in an attempt to prevent dust from stirring up. To the southeast, you can see a small field of grass and a giant tree. A sign saying 'Oak Road' points to the northwest.

room.name: Inside the Green Dragon
room.desc: For a small tavern, its fairly clean. The walls and floor are made of fine oak, the tables of a heavy cherry. The bar is made of some material you cannot identify, but is oddly beautiful. The entire place smells strongly of rosemary and what you can identify as good cooking. Ancient oil lamps keep the room light, but only barely.

room.name: Arden Village - Oak Road
room.desc: Several tall oak trees line the road, while a few short bushes fill in the spaces between the trees. This road is well traveled from what can be seen by its condition. Ruts and pot holes are scattered around the dirt road and several parts of broken carts are strewn across the bumpy surface. The road winds its way to the northwest and southeast.

extradesc.desc: Bright green leaves fill the branches of the oak trees. A few acorns are forming in the top most limbs, making a few squirrels very happy.
The dense leaves of the oak trees shade the road.
The acorns hang from the highest branches, causing hungry squirrels to scramble for their newly formed food.
Several squirrels call these trees their home.
Slightly wilted, the greenish bushes under the trees don't get quite as much sunlight.

room.name: Arden Village - Centre Town Square
room.desc: Before you is the sacred tree of the town, amid a field of emerald grass. The tree is clearly old and knotted, at least as thick as a tall human. The sienna trunk extends upwards, rising above the rooftops of the shops. The round leaves of the tree seem almost painted: a swirl of dark and light greens, mingling with a silvery overtone. The rich green grass is soft and tall, swaying quietly with even the slightest of breezes.
